definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: I [[כפר]] (of foll.; orig. mng. dub., but most prob. cover, cf. Ar. kafara cover, hide; > RS who thinks of Aram. [[כָפַר]], kpar Pa. wash away, rub off whence [[כּׂפֶר]],[[כִּפֶּר ]] of washing away, obliteration of sin : NH [[כִּפֶּר]], Aram. [[כַּפֵּר]] and derive.; Ar. kaf=a0rah;un an expiation (see RS:OTJC 438; 2. 381 Kn on Le 4:20 Ri:Begr. Der Sühne We:Comp. 335 f. Sm:AT Rel. Gesch. 321 Now:Arch. ii, 192 Dr:De 425 Schmoller:St,Kr. 1891, 205 ff. Lag:BN 230 ff.)).
